desc: Adds possible Sick effect to normal attack

dictionary.lore: Granloyd, as the arms department head, was torn over his responsibilities in improving his countries weapons in time for the inevitable battle it would face, and caring for his father who had fallen ill. Spending his days frustrated by his inability to carry out both duties, he stumbled upon a pike in his father's room. Taking up the dusty pike, he then realized exactly what it was he was meant to do.

name: Phantom Pike
